system.description:
Sing a song of joy! For even in the darkest days there are burning bright bonfires. What is darkness if not an absence of light? What is pain but a consequent of life? In this Festival of the Longest Night, rejoice! Happiness cannot be obtained, it is a becoming. Become joyful, Find Glory Beyond Heaven.

Prereq: Ceaseless Rhythm

Spend 1 Beat to mock a fighter in range 4 with your overwhelming joy: they suffer Eviscerate, Unbalance, and Provoke until they successfully score 2+ Hits against you with a single attack.

Bleeding Swordsong: +1 Beat to also inflict Bleed (1).

Astonishing Swordsong: +1 Beat to also inflict Stun (1).
